comment._content: Edward H. Whitney, 1911 Men's Tennis Singles champion from Harvard, class of 1914. www.docstoc.com/docs/49455512/Harvard-University_3_ In February, 1915, he was participating in the national indoor singles lawn tennis championship at the Seventh Regiment Armory (Park Avenue Armory) in New York. query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9F0CE5DF1238E633A... He competed in the U.S. Open from 1910 to 1916, excluding 1912. www.tennisarchives.com/coureurfiche.php?coureurid=6525
